alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, northern Gallia, southeastern Jackson, southeastern Vinton, north central Lawrence and north central Mason Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Webster, or 7 miles south of Oak Hill, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pomeroy, Oak Hill, Rio Grande, Rutland, Mason, Gallia, Vernon, Middleport, Syracuse, Hartford City, Vinton, Wilkesville, Cheshire, Adamsville, Radcliffe, Lakin, Dyesville, Salem Center, Harrisonville and Gage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and western West Virginia.
